price: Lasse dich ja nicht durch den Wandel derer in den Landstrichen täuschen, die ungläubig sind.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
